name: Gabriel
temple_description:
Gabriel is a distinguished and noble Archangel responsible for delivering messages from God. 
She is also known as the Angel of Death, as well as the Angel of Fire and Thunder. 
Among the Angelic Host, she holds the highest rankâ€”Seraph. 
According to legend, she was the one who sounded the trumpet of the Last Judgment, making her a symbol of wisdom.

active_skills.name: Hellfire
active_skills.effect: Attacks again if the attack crits, up to a maximum of 3 attacks.
